name: Crock Pot Roast
ingredients: 1 beef roast, 1 package brown gravy mix, 1 package dried Italian salad dressing mix, 1 package dry ranch dressing mix, 1/2 cup water
steps: Place beef roast in crock pot. Mix the dried mixes together in a bowl and sprinkle over the roast. Pour the water around the roast. Cook on low for 7-9 hours.

name: Roasted Asparagus
ingredients: 1 lb asparagus, 1 1/2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp kosher salt
steps: Preheat oven to 425Â°F. Cut off the woody bottom part of the asparagus spears and discard. With a vegetable peeler, peel off the skin on the bottom 2-3 inches of the spears (this keeps the asparagus from being all. Place asparagus on foil-lined baking sheet and drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt. With your hands, roll the asparagus around until they are evenly coated with oil and salt.Roast for 10-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of your stalks and how tender you like them.
